org.apache.accumulo.core.util.ratelimit

Interface SharedRateLimiterFactory.RateProvider

  • Enclosing class:
    SharedRateLimiterFactory

    public static interface SharedRateLimiterFactory.RateProvider
    A callback which provides the current rate for a RateLimiter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getDesiredRate()
      Calculate the current rate for the RateLimiter.

    • Method Detail

      • getDesiredRate

        long getDesiredRate()
        Calculate the current rate for the RateLimiter.
        Returns:
        Count of permits which should be provided per second. A nonpositive count is taken to indicate that no rate limiting should be performed.
